sentences.en: All entrants must warrant that their entry is entirely their own work.
sentences.cn: 所有参赛者必须保证其参赛作品完全是自己创作的。

sentences.en: At Dean Miller's suggestion, I have allowed her to give the current student organizers the opportunity to propose a program for next semester that might warrant continuation of this event on campus.
sentences.cn: 根据米勒学监的建议，我允许她给学生机会，让他们给下学期的活动提出一个方案，保证这个活动得以在校园内继续开展。

sentences.en: By accusing the King of murder, he signed his own death warrant.
sentences.cn: 他指控国王谋杀，从而让自己走上了绝路。

sentences.en: Cases of plant poisoning severe enough to warrant hospital admission are rare.
sentences.cn: 植物中毒严重至必须住院治疗的病例很少见.

sentences.en: Equipment is allocated by warrant.
sentences.cn: 设备已经按照令状分配好了。

sentences.en: For all other inspections, a warrant was still necessary.
sentences.cn: 至于所有其他的检查, 则仍须得到授权.

sentences.en: He had no warrant for doing that / what he did.
sentences.cn: 他那样做毫无道理.

sentences.en: I can do it with the warrant of a good conscience.
sentences.cn: 我用良心担保来做这件事.

sentences.en: I warrant you he is telling the truth.
sentences.cn: 我向你保证他说的是真话.

sentences.en: I'll warrant you'll thank me for it in years to come.
sentences.cn: 我敢说，几年之后你会感激我的。

sentences.en: If she shows her face again back in Massachusetts she'll find a warrant for her arrest waiting.
sentences.cn: 如果她重又在马萨诸塞州露面，等待她的将是一纸拘捕令。

sentences.en: Learning incessantly is the surest way to keep pace with the times in the information age and an infallible warrant of success in times of uncertainty.
sentences.cn: 持续的学习是在资讯时代中跟时代并驾齐驱的最稳当的方法，也是在变动的世代中成功的可靠保证。

sentences.en: No matter was too small to warrant his attention.
sentences.cn: 再小的事也会引起他的注意。

sentences.en: Police confirmed that they had issued a warrant for his arrest.
sentences.cn: 警方证实他们已经签发了对他的拘捕令。

sentences.en: The commissioner has issued a warrant for her arrest.
sentences.cn: 专员发出了对她的逮捕令.

sentences.en: The company issued warrants for 300,000 shares.
sentences.cn: 那家公司发放了30万股的认股权证。

sentences.en: The magistrate issued a warrant for his arrest.
sentences.cn: 地方法官发出了对他的逮捕令。

sentences.en: The President signed the death warrant .
sentences.cn: 总统签署了死刑执行令。

sentences.en: There is no warrant for copying other people’s work.
sentences.cn: 剽窃他人作品毫无道理。

sentences.en: Therefore, it is important to note that individual situations may warrant including additional characters in the list of special characters.
sentences.cn: 因此，要注意可能保证把额外字符包括到特殊字符列表中的个别情况，这一点很重要。

sentences.en: They issued a warrant for her arrest.
sentences.cn: 当局发出了逮捕她的令状。

sentences.en: Warrant Officer Gary Owen
sentences.cn: 加里∙欧文准尉

trans.tran_en: a legal document that is signed by a judge, allowing the police to take a particular action
to promise that something is true
to promise that something is true
